arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Sheffield Wednesday as late McCrorie goal secures point for Reds
arts.sum: In for Anis Mehmeti as one of the two number 10s and although he got on the ball a lot, he didn't always appear to be comfortable out of possession and was being coached through the game by Liam Manning at times. Another good option for Manning to have on the right alongside McCrorie and George Tanner.

arts.ttl: Bristol City hit back twice to hold Sheff Wed
arts.sum: Bristol City twice came from behind to earn a 2-2 draw with fellow Championship play-off contenders Sheffield Wednesday at Hillsborough.

arts.ttl: Bristol City battle back twice to deny Sheffield Wednesday victory
Bristol City predicted team vs Sheffield Wednesday as Reds aim to end six-match winless away run
arts.sum: Neither player showed their true quality against the Sky Blues last time out, but they were two of Bristol City's best players over the festive period and as a result, will likely keep their places in the starting line-up. Of course, Saturday's clash with Blackburn Rovers will also be in the back of the City boss' mind when he picks his team to face the Owls, as the games come thick and fast in the Championship.

arts.ttl: Stoke City interested in Fally Mayulu transfer seven months after striker's Bristol City move
arts.sum: Although Manning suggested earlier in the January transfer window that he was not keen to sanction a loan exit for the former Rapid Vienna forward, it is not yet clear whether or not Bristol City would be willing to part ways with him before the window closes at the start of February. Stoke City do hold an interest in Bristol City striker Fally Mayulu, Bristol Live understands, but the Robins are not believed to have received a £2.5million bid for the striker's services.

arts.ttl: Stoke City launch surprise £2.5m bid for Bristol City man
arts.sum: Stoke City have made a bid of £2.5m for Bristol City striker Fally Mayulu, according to the Express… The post Stoke City launch surprise £2.5m bid for Bristol City man appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Fee emerges as Portsmouth beat Sheffield Wednesday, QPR to striker deal
arts.sum: Portsmouth have paid £200,000 to sign Brisbane Roar striker Thomas Waddingham, a report from The News has revealed.… The post Fee emerges as Portsmouth beat Sheffield Wednesday, QPR to striker deal appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: What Bristol City can expect from Sheffield Wednesday and Danny Rohl after 'deflating' few weeks
arts.sum: After their four-match unbeaten run in the Championship came to an end last weekend, Bristol City's focus now turns to Wednesday night's clash with Sheffield Wednesday at Hillsborough. From a football perspective it's been good, going from almost certain relegation prior to Danny Rohl's arrival last season to being in with a sniff of the play-offs this time around is a pretty remarkable achievement, to be honest.

arts.ttl: Crewe Alexandra share Jamie Knight-Lebel update after impressive start to loan from Bristol City
arts.sum: Crewe Alexandra have confirmed that Bristol City loanee Jamie Knight-Lebel will remain with the League Two club for the remainder of the season. Although Knight-Lebel will not be returning to the West Country this month, Liam Manning has paid close attention to the 20-year-old's development and has been keen to praise his performances in recent weeks.
